law.catch_line: Definition of sign appertaining to Section 2-103.15.

text.section:
Sec. 2-103.14. Definition of sign appertaining to Section 2-103.15.
"Signs" means any combination of structure and message in the form of an outdoor sign, display device, figure, painting, drawing, message, placard, poster, billboard, advertising structure, advertisement, logo, symbol, or other form, whether placed individually or on a V-type, back-to-back, side-to-side, stacked, or doubled-faced display, designed, intended, or used to advertise or inform. The term does not include an official traffic control sign, official marker, entrance feature or specific information panel erected, caused to be erected, or approved by the Director of the Public Works Department. The term does not include signs approved by Miami-Dade County prior to the effective date of this Ordinance Number 87-56.
